item.title: 5 Reasons Reviews For Millie Bobby Brown & Chris Pratt's New Netflix Movie Are So Bad
item.description: Though the poor reviews of Netflix's The Electric State are shocking, critics have raised valid points about what made the film a flawed blockbuster.

item.title: Where To Watch Novocaine: Showtimes & Streaming Status
item.description: Jack Quaid's action-packed film, Novocaine, will be released exclusively in theaters and come out for digital and streaming at a later date.

item.title: "What Do You Want Me To Do, Some Of The Minor Characters?": Hans Zimmer Confirms MCU Has Reached Out & Explains Why He Turned Them Down
item.description: Legendary movie composer Hans Zimmer isn't too interested in scoring an MCU movie despite discussing the possibility with Marvel Studios' Kevin Feige.
